```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```
```{r, message=FALSE}
# Read in the Oil Spill data
incidents <- read_csv(here("data","Oil_Spill_Incident_Tracking.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(incident_date = date(dateofinci))

ca_counties <- read_sf(here("data","CA_counties","CA_counties.shp")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(name, aland) %>% 
  rename(county_name = name, land_area = aland)


#incidents %>% st_crs()
#ca_counties %>% st_crs()
#incidents <- st_transform(incidents, 3857)
```

```{r}
# Make an interactive map
ggplot(data = ca_counties)+
  geom_sf(aes(fill = land_area), color = "white", size = 0.1)+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_fill_gradientn(colors = c("tan","tan4","sienna4"))
```
